about.initial_text: Idea and first version: Mar√≠a Teresa Gonz√°lez. Basic version of the interactive classroom desktop.
about.development_text: Transformation of the initial prototype into an operational application: Pablo G. Gu√≠zar.
about.continuity_text: Maintenance and development of the current version: Juan Jos√© de Haro and Pablo G. Gu√≠zar.
about.community_text: This project is part of the Educational Apps Repository of the Vibe Coding Educativo community.

markdown_text_editor.title: Markdown Text Editor
markdown_text_editor.sample_content:
# Markdown Text Editor

Write your document here. Use **bold**, *italic*, lists and formulas:

- Circle area: $A = \pi r^2$
- Quadratic equation: $$x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$$

> Open EdiCuaTeX to insert formulas visually.
markdown_text_editor.edicuatex_subtitle: Press "Send" to insert the formula into the text.
markdown_text_editor.popup_blocked: The browser blocked the EdiCuaTeX window.
markdown_text_editor.search_keywords: markdown, latex, formula, formulas, equation, equations, math
markdown_text_editor.help: Markdown text editor with LaTeX formulas. You can save as Markdown (.md), copy the Markdown code, copy the HTML code to paste into other word processors, and print to PDF.

alarm.title: Alarm / Timer
alarm.invalid_countdown: Enter a time greater than zero.

alarm.empty_tip_profiles: They also work when you switch profiles.
alarm.empty_tip_sound: You can enable or disable sound per alarm.
alarm.empty_tip_clock: Countdowns appear in the clock at the top right.

vce.title: Community apps
vce.start_tooltip: Apps created by the Vibe Coding Educativo community.
vce.search_keywords: vibe coding, vibe coding educativo, community apps, repository
vce.subtitle: Apps from the Vibe Coding Educativo Telegram community
vce.search_placeholder: Search by title, author, or description
vce.intro:
Apps created by teachers from the Telegram group Vibe Coding Educativo: https://t.me/vceduca
Filter by level and area, pick one from the left list, and open it in the viewer or a new tab.
More info at https://vibe-coding-educativo.github.io/
Favorites are saved only inside this widget.
vce.iframe_blocked: This website cannot be accessed from the viewer. Open it in a new tab.
vce.intro_line1: Apps created by teachers from the Telegram group Vibe Coding Educativo:
vce.intro_line2: Filter by level and area, pick one from the left list, and open it in the viewer or a new tab. If you see an error while loading, use the new tab.
vce.intro_line4: Favorites are saved only inside this widget.
vce.intro_title: Apps created by teachers from the Telegram group Vibe Coding Educativo
vce.intro_step2: Select a tool from the left list.
vce.intro_step3: Open it in the viewer or in a new tab.
vce.intro_step4: If a loading error appears, use the new tab.
vce.intro_step5: Favorites keep the selected tools visible at the top of the list.

chatgpt_ia_edu.title: ChatGPT-IA-edu community
chatgpt_ia_edu.search_keywords: chatgpt ia edu, chatgpt-ia-edu, educational ai
chatgpt_ia_edu.description: Community and resources for the ChatGPT-IA-edu project.

edumedia_iag.title: EduMedia-IAG
edumedia_iag.search_keywords: edumedia, iag, generative ai, educational multimedia
edumedia_iag.subtitle: Educational multimedia with generative AI
edumedia_iag.intro_p1: Explore the educational potential of generative AI tools applied to multimedia creation. This channel is designed for teachers, trainers, and enthusiasts who want to integrate AI-generated audio, video, and images into their teaching proposals.
edumedia_iag.intro_p2: We share resources, resolve technical questions, and analyze good practices in using these tools with a pedagogical focus. Here you will learn to create attractive, accessible materials aligned with current educational goals.
edumedia_iag.intro_p3: This space is linked to the ChatGPT-IA-edu group, specialized in educational uses of AI. From there, the Vibe Coding Educativo initiative is also promoted, focused on building educational apps with AI and natural language.
edumedia_iag.note_no_iframe: The channel cannot be displayed inside the desktop viewer. Use the buttons to open the links in a new tab.
edumedia_iag.link_telegram_text: Access the main channel to follow updates, technical questions, and classroom use cases.
edumedia_iag.link_weekly_text: Weekly digest with the most useful conversations.
edumedia_iag.link_agent_text: Quick answers to common questions with group knowledge.
edumedia_iag.link_superagent_text: Agent that aggregates knowledge from ChatGPT-IA-edu, Vibe Coding Educativo, and EduMedia-IAG.
edumedia_iag.link_multiprompts_text: Multimedia platform with apps to create materials with generative AI.
edumedia_iag.link_visualprompts_text: Tools to create educational images with visual prompts.
edumedia_iag.link_chatgpt_text: Parent community focused on educational uses of AI.
edumedia_iag.link_vce_text: Initiative for educational apps built with AI and natural language.
edumedia_iag.link_open_text: This group follows the Open Knowledge principles.

widgets_help.edumedia-iag: Educational multimedia resources with generative AI.

widgets_help.iframe: Web viewer for pages inside the desktop.
widgets_help.local-web: Save and run local websites offline.

widgets_help.random-spinner: Random spinner for draws and turns.
widgets_help.qr-code-generator: Generate QR codes to share links.
